text: Richard Ryder may refer to: * Richard D. Ryder (born 1940), British psychologist and animal rights advocate * Richard Ryder, Baron Ryder of Wensum (born 1949), British Conservative Party British politician and current member of the House of Lords * Richard Ryder (politician, born 1766) (1766–1832), British politician * Richard Ryder (actor) (1942-1995), actor who guest starred in Star Trek: Deep Space Nine and other television shows and movies * Nova (Richard Rider), a Marvel Comics superhero whose name is often misspelled as Ryder * Richard Ryder (comedian), Canadian comedian and broadcaster
title: Richard Ryder
